message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start.
Okay Alice, how about a 55/45 split in my favor? This seems more reasonable considering the inflation working against me.
That's a little too much in your favor, Bob. The inflation isn't crippling yet.
How about a compromise, Bob? 57/43 seems fair considering the time pressure.
Time is running out Alice! I'm proposing 52/48.  Let's close this deal and both come out ahead.
This deal is getting worse for me, Bob. I need you to move closer to an even split.
Bob, we need to settle this quickly. I'm offering 54/46.  It's closer to even and gives us both something.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. 51/49 is my final offer. Take it or leave it, we're running out of time!
Alright, Bob, you win. 51/49 it is. Let's just end this before the inflation eats up all the profit!
